member.name: MFVideoTransferFunction
member.summary: Specifies the conversion function from linear RGB to non-linear RGB (R'G'B').

member.name: MFVideoTransferFunction.MFVideoTransFunc_22
member.summary: True 2.2 gamma, L' = L^1/2.2. This transfer function is used in ITU-R BT.470-2 System M (NTSC).

member.name: MFVideoTransferFunction.MFVideoTransFunc_709
member.summary: ITU-R BT.709 transfer function. Gamma 2.2 curve with a linear segment in the lower range. This transfer function is used in BT.709, BT.601, SMPTE 296M, SMPTE 170M, BT.470, and SPMTE 274M. In addition BT-1361 uses this function within the range [0...1].

member.name: MFVideoTransferFunction.MFVideoTransFunc_240M
member.summary: SPMTE 240M transfer function. Gamma 2.2 curve with a linear segment in the lower range.

member.name: MFVideoTransferFunction.MFVideoTransFunc_sRGB
member.summary: sRGB transfer function. Gamma 2.4 curve with a linear segment in the lower range.

member.name: MFVideoTransferFunction.MFVideoTransFunc_28
member.summary: True 2.8 gamma. L' = L^1/2.8. This transfer function is used in ITU-R BT.470-2 System B, G (PAL).

summary.para: Logarithmic transfer (100:1 range); for example, as used in H.264 video.
Logarithmic transfer (316.22777:1 range); for example, as used in H.264 video.
Constant luminance ITU-R BT.2020. See Recommendation ITU-R BT.2020-2.
Non-constant luminance ITU-R BT.2020. See Recommendation ITU-R BT.2020-2.
SMPTE ST.2084 also known as PQ. Also defined in ITU-R BT.2100
summary.div: Note Requires Windows 10, version 1703 or later.
Note Requires Windows 10, version 1703 or later.

member.name: MFVideoTransferFunction.MFVideoTransFunc_ForceDWORD
member.summary: Reserved. This member forces the enumeration type to compile as a DWORD value.
